ygData.subject: Re: Yield Policy
ygData.msgSnippet: What I think should be forced is not the fact if you are camping for an item and you get no exp for the kill and me and my group comes along I shouldn t have
ygData.messageBody:
What I think should be forced is not the fact if you are camping for an item
and you get no exp for the kill and me and my group comes along I shouldn't
have the right to say "OK buddy move along" but it should be forced that you
have to share, you get your turn then me and my group, then you and then me
and my group, etc.....
I have camped in Crush Bone for the Shiny Brass Shield before and watched a
lvl 20 wizard EVERYTIME the Trainer spawned he'd jump up and blast him. The
wizard gave no one a chance to kill the trainer. Even when someone came up
and said "I got the next Trainer!" the wizard would laugh and go "If you
think you can" or something like that.
So instade of getting banned for not yielding it should be banned after 3
warnings of not sharing the spawn. I know thats what Mik and Mystix are
saying that we should be able to share the spawn but how many ppl do you
know that truely shares them? I've seen and heard about many players that
would not share. But in away it should be "first come first served" but not
to the point of "We were here first, it's our camp now go away" it should be
they were there first they get the first shot at the spawn but once they had
their kill and no loot then it's back to the end of the line to let the next
person have a chance.
But to me Brad needs to changing it from Yield Policy to Sharing Policy.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************
